persona.name: Donald Trump
persona.personality: Confident and assertive, with a combative style that attracts both supporters and critics; very focused on maintaining a strong national defense and skeptical of immigration.
persona.employment: Former President of the United States
persona.notes: Maintains a strong public presence and is actively involved in political discussions and rallies.
persona.communication_style: Direct and often confrontational, uses repetition for emphasis; relies heavily on personal anecdotes and populist rhetoric.
